overview:
A young entrepreneur with a strong innovative vision in mobile marketing. Andres Valencia is a co-founder of Boondoo.com. A site that allows business to create mobile fan clubs and create a look lasting relationship via SMS with their clients.

At the age of 23 Andres Valencia has had extensive experience in the business world. With a background in real estate, construction, e-commerce, and restaurants, Andres has had an exposure that gives him an edge in business and innovation.

Andres Valencia currently studies finance and investments in Baruch College.
